quotes.quote: Celebrate your inner beauty, but buy mascara as a backup.
She should use more mascara. When one is young, one should use a lot of mascara. When one is old, they should use much more.
I won`t cry for you, my mascara`s too expensive.
Men are like mascara, they run at the slightest display of emotion.
Every woman deserves a man to ruin her lipstick, not her mascara.
Your soul shines through even if you haven't got mascara on.
He already ruined your mascara dont let him ruin your life.
And since gin to artifice bears the same relation as tears to mascara, her attractions at once dissembled.
Dreams make those eyes more enchanting than mascara ever can.
Had the eyes not held back the tears, the mascara would have walked away telling everyone about a broken heart.. Even make up teaches sometimes..
Smile and love are the best mascara and shades of girl's eyes.
I remember watching the mascara tears flood the ivories and I thought, 'It's OK to be sad.' I've been trained to love my darkness.
If you think there's no such thing as a magic wand you've clearly never used mascara.
I never wear mascara; I laugh until I cry too often.
Earlier, watching her apply mascara with ritual concentration, he'd wondered just how beautiful a woman had to be before she believed it.
Yeah, Im hurting but on goes the mascara & lip gloss. That's right. I'll be the prettiest wreck you've ever seen.
These people are amazing. It's so emotional I was thinking about wearing waterproof mascara.
Inner beauty is great but a little mascara never hurts.
Fake mascara didn't matter. The kajal of her life was already smudged.
You know, you go home and you try on a new mascara, and I guess a male CEO can't do that.
